step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Try to bring your shoulder blades closer together as you roll them down.
Nicely done! Focus on a smooth, continuous circular motion, bringing your shoulders forward as they come up.
Great job completing the first set! Remember to breathe deeply as you roll your shoulders back.
Excellent! You're maintaining good form. Keep that shoulder blade squeeze consistent.
Very good! Continue to focus on the full range of motion, bringing your shoulders forward and up.
Fantastic! You've completed both sets with great control. Keep up the excellent work on your shoulder mobility.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the shoulder rolls! Remember to focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together and making a smooth circular motion. Keep up the good work with your breathing to maximize the benefits.
